abilities.name: Stages of Evolution
abilities.effect: As long as Jynx is an Evolved Pokémon, prevent all effects of opponent's attacks, except damage, done to Jynx, and Jynx has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Freeze Light
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Pure Power
attacks.effect: Put 4 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.
